Player History
Drafted in 28th round, 434th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit on 5/27/2015, off James Buono (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/23/2015, off Joshua Zeringue (MON)...
Released by Atlanta on 5/21/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/7/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2017, hitting .353 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
